title: ﻿क्या कांग्रेस प्रवक्ता मणिशंकर अय्यर बालाकोट हमले में मारे गए?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: BJP and PM routinely use filthy language to attack the Congress party. The Congress has a different culture and heritage. I do not appreciate the tone and language used by Mr Mani Shankar Aiyer to address the PM. Both the Congress and I expect him to apologise for what he said.
